title: E-commerce (TypeScript)

description: A task manager app built with React and TypeScript, featuring task management, drag-and-drop, and filtering.

description: My portfolio website built with React, utilizing useState, useEffect, components, and react-scroll for smooth navigation.

description: A Tic-Tac-Toe game built with JavaScript, featuring interactive gameplay and basic game logic.

description: A classic To-Do List built with JavaScript. Features task addition, editing, deletion, and Local Storage support

description: An Apple-style calculator built with JavaScript, featuring a sleek design and basic arithmetic functionality.

description: A memory mini-game built with JavaScript, featuring button event handling and interactive gameplay.
